230 Plato.							<       
230 An								<       
230 Athenian							<       
230 philosopher							<       
230 (428-347							<

230 of								<       
230 the								<       
230 Academy.							<

230 Syracusan							<

230 of								<

230 and								<       
230 II.								<       
230 The								<       
230 Platonic							<       
230 theory							<       
230 of								<       
230 Ideas							<       
230 is								<       
230 an								<

230 of								<       
230 definition							<

230 or								<
